issue.title: [Java][Plasma] Add JNI list() interface
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-8082](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8082). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Currently Plasma list() method is not implemented in Java code. Implement PlasmaClientJNI.list() interface and add some UT.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8082?focusedCommentId=17058001) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
This is the first Plasma JNI issue we've seen action on in some time. Do you intend to help maintain this code?

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8082?focusedCommentId=17058348) by KunshangJi (kunshang.ji):*
`[~wesm]`  Sure, I'd like to help.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8082?focusedCommentId=17073842) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Issue resolved by pull request 6588
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/6588>
